# uberspace_webdomain (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uberspace_webdomain" "minio" {
  asteroid = "isabell"
  name     = "minio.isabell.uber.space"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `asteroid` (String) Name of a hosting account, e.g. 'isabell'.
- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `asteroid_name` (String)
- `format` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `domain` (String)
- `domain_display` (String)
- `domain_idn` (String)
- `name_display` (String)
- `name_idn` (String)
- `updated_at` (String)
